sect2.title: Installation of Pax
sect2.para: This package has somewhat unusual installation instructions, because pax is part of a larger set of utilities included in the same tarball. Issue the following commands to unpack and build the application:

screen.userinput:
gzip -dck paxmirabilis-20161104.cpio.gz | cpio -mid && cd pax &&
sed -i '/stat.h/a #include <sys/sysmacros.h>' cpio.c gen_subs.c tar.c &&
cc -O2 -DLONG_OFF_T -o pax -DPAX_SAFE_PATH=\"/bin\" *.c

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed ...: This eliminates some irritating warnings.
